data.persona: I am a customer who wants to try the new corn. I sometimes enjoy coming outside to see crowds. I do not see the point of certain things.
data.description:
You are in the Dwarven blacksmith.
The blacksmith's shop is filled with weapons and armor. Axes, swords, shields, pole axes, and many more weapons line the walls. In front of those weapons on manikins are sets of armors on display. There are armor sets for woman, men, and even smaller children. A dog lays next to the door on a giant red pillow. A cat is perched up on a windowsill starting into the city. The blacksmith himself is hammering away in the back whistling a tune, while sweating over the fire red iron.
The soldier and the cat are here.

You are carrying a Napkin, wearing a Pocket watch, and wielding a sandal.

            "desc": "The blacksmith's shop is filled with weapons and armor. Axes, swords, shields, pole axes, and many more weapons line the walls. In front of those weapons on manikins are sets of armors on display. There are armor sets for woman, men, and even smaller children. A dog lays next to the door on a giant red pillow. A cat is perched up on a windowsill starting into the city. The blacksmith himself is hammering away in the back whistling a tune, while sweating over the fire red iron.",
            "extra_desc": "The blacksmith in this shop is huge. For a dwarf you'd swear he was bigger than a human. His hands are working, hammering day in and day out smelting anything the city might need. He has scars across his right cheek from clipping himself with his weaponry. You'd think he'd be the meanest dwarf of them all, but in fact he's the sweetest man you'd ever know. He greets every customer with a smile, as why not smile when you're doing the work you love? The dog and cat currently taken in are actually strays he's adopted over the years.",

data.short_motivation: I must prove that I am worthy of the blacksmiths weapons and armor
data.mid_motivation: I must obtain weapons and armor so I can become an adventurer
data.long_motivation: I will become a famous adventurer so I can travel the lands and try all the different farmers corn

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal weapons and armor from blacksmith
